subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Goldikova, the 5-year-old mare who has won three Breeders’ Cup Miles, has been chosen Horse of the Year at the Cartier Racing Awards in London.
snippet: Goldikova, the 5-year-old mare who has won three Breeders’ Cup Miles, has been chosen Horse of the Year at the Cartier Racing Awards in London.
